meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Public Testimony
agenda_items.description: Public comments on agenda items 4 â€“ 10.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of April 23, 2024 Board Meeting and June 11, 2024 Special Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Board members disclose any relationships with projects on the agenda.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution for the transaction for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail, including necessary documentation and authorizing the purchase of land.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Oakhouse at Colorado II
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for Oakhouse at Colorado II.

agenda_items.title: Maintenance and Demolition Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the maintenance and demolition of the property located at 9999 Technology Boulevard.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of the Dallas PFC Pipeline Report.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Website Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of the Dallas PFC Website Report.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.
